Reviews.Title: Good camera - Excellent practical bundle - and quick shipping and good packaging from seller
Reviews.Author: Jim Dunn
Reviews.Content: Quick shipping and well packed by seller. The bundle pretty much has all the really  necessary accessories, including a decent case, extra battery ( a must for any camera) and a nice size 32gb memory card, car charger, cleaning kit etc. As to the camera itself, it takes excellent pictures. This is my 3rd Lumix , I upgrade every few years so I kind of knew what to expect. Most of my pictures are wildlife so the 60x optical zoom was  a major factor . It has not disappointed.  Sometimes the auto focus struggles a bit, especially further out in the zoom range, but that's to be expected, and especially if you're shooting with the camera hand held as opposed to on a tripod. If you're looking for a good alternative to a DSLR, or want a 2nd camera to complement your DSLR, for times when you don't want to be dealing with multiple lenses etc. , this camera fills the bill nicely.

Reviews.Title: Camera great but camera bag no so much!!
Reviews.Author: Susan G. Bartlett
Reviews.Content: No problem with the camera but the camera bag is almost too small for the camera and there is definitely no way you can put any accessories in it.  I don't think anyone checked the size before putting it in the package bundle!

ProductInfo.Features:
Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ70 Digital Camera
DMW-BMB9PP Lithium-Ion Battery
LexSpeed 32GB Class 10 SDHC Memory Card
Lowepro Camera Bag
Digital Camera Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic LUMIX DMC-FZ70 + Lowepro Camera Bag + Battery + 32GB (10)
